Field Label: Please check the **Mindfulness** skills you used today:

Form Note: Your emotions, DBT skills, and target behaviors for the day
Field Label: Please check the **Interpersonal Effectiveness** skills you used today:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Objective Effectiveness (DEAR MAN), DEARMAN.png | 2, Relationship Effectiveness (GIVE), GIVE.png | 3, Self-respect Effectivness (FAST), FAST.png | 4, Dialectics, dialectics.png

Form Note: Your emotions, DBT skills, and target behaviors for the day
